name: fast-glob
description: It's a very fast and efficient glob library for Node.js

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run compile -- --sourceMap --watch
scripts.bench: npm run bench-async && npm run bench-stream && npm run bench-sync
scripts.bench-async: npm run bench-async-flatten && npm run bench-async-deep && npm run bench-async-partial-flatten && npm run bench-async-partial-deep
scripts.bench-stream: npm run bench-stream-flatten && npm run bench-stream-deep && npm run bench-stream-partial-flatten && npm run bench-stream-partial-deep
scripts.bench-sync: npm run bench-sync-flatten && npm run bench-sync-deep && npm run bench-sync-partial-flatten && npm run bench-sync-partial-deep
